statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-6 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + x + 3 , 22 \, x^{3} - 14 \, x^{2} - 10 \, x - 12 , 18 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 9 , 2 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - x + 3 , 5 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
